name: Bond Repair Custom Leave-In Treatment for Damaged Straight and Wavy Hair
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Leave-In Conditioner
about: What it is: A customizable, lightweight leave-in treatment designed for straight and wavy hair that addresses all signs of damage caused by coloring, heat tools, and bleaching. Add up to 2 Hair Goal Concentrates to target specific hair needs or enhance results such as added frizz control, extra shine or a boost of moisture...Hair Texture: Straight and Wavy..Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Concerns:.- Damage/Split Ends/Breakage.- Frizz.- Heat Protection..Key Benefits:.- Cares for damage while enhancing shine.- Delivers up to 24 hours of frizz control.- Provides heat protection up to 450¬∞F..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Babassu Oil: Moisturizes..- Amaranth Extract: Adds shine..- Adaptive f3 Bonding Complex: Targets signs of damage and reduces breakage...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, phthalates, and mineral oil. It is also gluten-free and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: Harnessing the brand‚Äôs highest concentration of bond-repair technology, this versatile leave-in treatment can be applied to wet or dry hair, requiring no heat activation to unlock its key benefits. With an innovative texture, it combines the performance of a serum with the luxury of a cream for the ultimate hair-care experience. If your hair is straight, enhance your results by adding Volumizing and Shine Hair Goal Concentrates (sold separately). For wavy hair, add Anti-Frizz and Shine Hair Goal Concentrates (sold separately)...Fragrance Description: Like a bouquet of fresh spring flowers, the fragrance unfolds with notes of pink peony, wild freesia, and creamy sandalwood. It‚Äôs also microbiome-friendly, thanks to Z-Biome patented technology...Clinical Results: In a clinical study on hair that was bleached 2 times, after 1 use, results showed:.- Breakage was reduced up to 6X.- Hair was strengthened up to 6X.- Strands were smoothed up to 3X

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Pour up to two full Hair Goal Concentrates (sold separately) into your product. .-Shake vigorously for 15 to 30 seconds before the first use..-Apply a quarter-size amount to clean, towel-dried hair, focusing on mid-lengths and ends. .-Style hair as usual. .-Reapply on dry hair as needed..-For maximum shine, add The Shine Queen (sold separately) to your formula, then style as normal...For straight, flat hair:.-Use with The Lift Legend and The Shine Queen (each sold separately)...For wavy, blonde hair:.-Use with The Frizz Genius and The Blonde Hero (each sold separately)...Note: Due to the high performance of this product, no more than two Hair Goal Concentrates are recommended.
